philosophy.text: Survival, extraction, corruption, and collapse matter more than body count.
philosophy.design_intent: Force movement, reward risk, and punish hesitation.

victory_logic.withdrawal_rule: Players may voluntarily withdraw for narrative or scoring reasons.

pacing_and_escalation.escalation_trigger: If no major changes by Round 3, escalation MUST begin.

game_modes.skirmish: Small forces, tight objectives, fast escalation.
game_modes.ritual_corruption: Mystic/Thyr focus. Sacred and Haunted terrain importance.

multi_faction_logic.structure: Alternating model activation remains. Temporary alliances are allowed.
